header_text: Returning home on a very hot day, you quickly drink a large glass of water. You soon feel abnormally full and a bit sick to your stomach. This feeling is surprising and uncomfortable, but you realize that it is something you can simply observe.

elements.Text: You responded to the feelings of sickness in your stomach by ...

elements.name: Returning home on a very hot day, you quickly drink a large glass of water. You soon feel abnormally full and a bit sick to your stomach. This feeling is surprising and uncomfortable, but you realize that it is something you can simply observe._Physical Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
buttons: Observing the sensations without doing anything.
Panicking about the sensations and calling an ambulance.
